channel.title: Recent & Upcoming Talks on Zhi Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Recent & Upcoming Talks on Zhi Yang

item.title: Extracting topics from cancer patients' mutational profiles
item.description: An application of topic modeling in genomic data

item.title: E-cigarette product characteristics
item.description: Young adults using mod (vs. pen-like) e-cigarette devices at baseline smoked more than 6 times as many cigarettes in the past 30 days at follow-up.

item.title: Extracting topics from cancer patients' mutational profiles
item.description: An introduction on how to apply topic modeling on somatic mutations

item.title: Bayesian modeling with R2jags
item.description: a gentle introduction on how to fit a simple Bayesian model, visualize and summarize the output using R2jags.

item.title: How to make xaringan slides in R
item.description: A tutorial talk on how to make xaringan slides in R

item.description: A talk on what I’ve learned from going to the RStudio conference 2019

item.description: An example talk on developing good pratices in R

item.title: Statistical approach for investigating change in mutational processes during cancer growth and development
item.description: An example talk using Academic’s Markdown slides feature.
